trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs> class contains information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs> classe contém informações para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs> class provides access to the display mode that was applied to the Web Parts control before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs> classe fornece acesso para o modo de exibição que foi aplicado ao controle de Web Parts antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: The former display mode is accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs.OldDisplayMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O modo de exibição anterior é acessado por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs.OldDisplayMode%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> applied to the Web Parts control before the display mode is changed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> aplicado ao controle de Web Parts antes que o modo de exibição seja alterado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the former display mode for a Web Part control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo de exibição anterior para um controle de Web Part.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> applied to a Web Parts control before the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> aplicado a um controle de Web Parts antes do <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged" /> evento.
